mapper.select: select * from tb_sys_user t where t.user_id = #{userId}
select * from tb_sys_user t ORDER BY t.user_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name,u.user_sex, r.id "role.id",r.role_name "role.role_name",r.role_desc "role.role_desc" FROM tb_sys_user u left join tb_sys_user_role_ref urr on u.user_id = urr.user_id left join tb_sys_role r on r.id = urr.role_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
